# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and relevance to you at $15000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $14000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-value item at a discounted rate. I trust this offer will meet your expectations and align with your budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
